setup_steps: TIMEOUT: Docker pull extremely slow due to GFW
TIMEOUT: PyTorch image not cached on host
Retry: RTX 3060, Quebec/Canada, minimal CUDA base
Music generation via ComfyUI API: SUCCESS

failures.description: China region instance (Jiangsu) could not pull Docker images due to GFW blocking Docker Hub
nvidia/cuda:12.4.1-devel-ubuntu22.04 (~10GB) was unnecessary. Runtime image (~4GB) sufficient for inference
failures.resolution: Use runtime image instead of devel

failures.description: PyTorch Docker image not cached on vast.ai host, causing very slow startup
failures.resolution: Use minimal base image + pip install, or use prebuild image

lessons_learned: Always exclude CN region: geolocation notin ["CN"]
Use runtime, not devel Docker images for inference
Prefer prebuild Docker images with models pre-baked
